Package com.thalesgroup.tmgsdk

Interface MastercardIssuerAuthenticationListener

  • public interface MastercardIssuerAuthenticationListener
    This callback is used to inform the MastercardTAFHelper.triggerIssuerAuthentication(String, String, MastercardIssuerAuthenticationListener) process result.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Version:
    1.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onError​(TMGClientException tmgClientException)
      Call back for an App to indicate token binding to device is failed.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession pendingBindingSession, TMGClientException tmgClientException)
      Call back for an App to indicate activation is failure.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession pendingBindingSession)
      Call back for an App to show the issuer activation screen to continue with the IDV process.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession pendingBindingSession)
      Call back for an App to indicate activation is required when MastercardIDVMethod is chosen and sent to server.
      void onSuccess()
      Call back for an App to indicate token binding to device is successful.

    • Method Detail

      • onIssuerAuthenticationReady

        void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(@NonNull
                                 MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession pendingBindingSession)
        Call back for an App to show the issuer activation screen to continue with the IDV process. Next step is to validate OTP according to the selected MastercardIDVMethod.
        Parameters:
        pendingBindingSession - Object to use for activation

      • onIssuerAuthenticationRequired

        void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(@NonNull
                                    MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession pendingBindingSession)
        Call back for an App to indicate activation is required when MastercardIDVMethod is chosen and sent to server. Next step is to show the available MastercardIDVMethod and select one.
        Parameters:
        pendingBindingSession - Object to use for activation

      • onIssuerAuthenticationError

        void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(@Nullable
                                 MastercardIssuerAuthenticationSession pendingBindingSession,
                                 @NonNull
                                 TMGClientException tmgClientException)
        Call back for an App to indicate activation is failure. The binding session is kept opened and it is possible to retry.
        Parameters:
        pendingBindingSession - Object to use for activation. Returned when it is possible to retry the activation.
        tmgClientException - Returned error code and message
        Possible errors:
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_WRONG_OTP
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_TOKEN_STATE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_IDV_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_EXPIRED_OTP
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
        • TMGClientException.ISSUER_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_OTP
        • TMGClientException.JSON_PARSING_ERROR

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        Call back for an App to indicate token binding to device is successful.

      • onError

        void onError​(@NonNull
             TMGClientException tmgClientException)
        Call back for an App to indicate token binding to device is failed.
        Parameters:
        tmgClientException - Returned error code and message
        Possible errors:
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_NO_SESSION_FOUND
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_IS_NOT_ACCESSIBLE
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_IDV_METHOD
        • TMGClientException.ISSUER_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_PARAMETERS
        • TMGClientException.DEVICE_AUTHENTICATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • TMGClientException.AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE_CANCEL
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.TOKEN_NOT_BOUNDED
        • TMGClientException.JSON_PARSING_ERROR
